Reviews.Title: So far, so good
Reviews.Author: lwt
Reviews.Content: I  just received this lens and so far it lives up to my expectations.  I bought this lens because it has the stabilizing function and since I have a slight tremor it really helps to deliver the clear, crisp shots. The camera is super.  Just wish it had a slightly faster fps in continuous shooting.
